summary: A handy text file to remove all clothes and items from an NPC quickly. It does not put them into your inventory.
descriptionHtml:
This is not a MOD. It is a handy text file to remove all clothes and items from an NPC quickly. It does not put them into your inventory. I simply combined the two console commands \"bat removeallitems\" and \"bat unequipall\" to one simple command. 

I need Lydia naked so she can perform her private \"Adult Show\" in my Breezewood home, so I created a simple text file to achieve multiple commands, literally striping her of everything, now she can perform for me uninhibited. I use this on Lydia but it works with all NPC\'s in the game. 

Use the Nexus Mod Manager- or unzip the download and copy/paste the text file to your Steam>Skyrim>Data folder. When you are in the game, pull up the command console, select your NPC of choice and simply type \"bat ra\" 

**Thanks to TriRoc, Tr1dae and RainofChaos for:
*Adult Show XXX by TriRoc, Tr1dae and RainofChaos
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8714

**Thank you Caliente for:
*Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

**HAVE SEX w/a NPC!
- Animated Prostitution - Skyrim - Beta by JoshNZ
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10748
author: LordGambrinus
